title: Campari and Grapefruit Ice Pops
directions: Simmer sugar and water in a small saucepan, stirring, until sugar is dissolved, then cool syrup. Stir in remaining ingredients and pour through a fine sieve into a large glass measuring cup. Pour into molds. Freeze at least 24 hours. Add sticks when mixture is slushy, about 1 hour.
ingredients: 2 cups freshly squeezed pink grapefruit juice
Special equipment: 9 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 9 wooden sticks
